subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Tulowitzki doubled and singled in his return to the Toronto lineup on Friday after missing three weeks with injuries, and the visiting Blue Jays rallied past the Tampa Bay Rays, 8-4.
snippet: Tulowitzki doubled and singled in his return to the Toronto lineup on Friday after missing three weeks with injuries, and the visiting Blue Jays rallied past the Tampa Bay Rays, 8-4.
